title: In plots, less than 60sq
clause_text: In plots, less than 60sq. m in area, no front open space need be provided if the means of access serving such plots is at least 3 m in width.

source_pdf.text_snippet: In plots, less than 60sq. m in area, no front open space need be provided if the means of access serving such plots is at least 3 m in width.
